data.name: getmusicbee.com by BamaBraves
Kobatochan Reader Mode
data.description: Removes unnecessary material, removes side columns, removes the banner image, centers the chapter content, banner and search. Makes for a more pleasant reading experience. Github repository. Pairs well with my kobatochan accesskey naviagtion script. --- If you're feeling generous or like my stuff, feel free to donate. I'd appreciate it. Ko-fi. Paypal. Liberapay.

user.name: Vednoc
user.about: Hi! I am Vednoc, but people mostly call me Mew. Making website themes is one of the things that I absolutely love doing, so I decided to share them with the world.

data.name: Pixiv Dark Grey + Sketch + FANBOX 2020
data.description: A recoloring skin for Pixiv and Sketch to the Dark Grey scheme.

data.name: Baidu Lite 百度轻 - 轻萌化
data.description: 你一定会喜欢的简约且好看的百度轻萌化！ 在pan_cao大大的“Baidu Lite 百度轻”上进行了一定的轻萌化，百度轻魔改版。 作者博客：kira.cool 实现功能： 1. 修复原版“Baidu Lite 百度轻”的搜索框不能正常使用的问题 2. 新闻搜索可以正常使用 3. 卡片半透明化 4. 高分屏适配 5. 支持图片背景 注意： 1. 在未登录百度账号时，百度会额外引用一个未登录的 css 文件，在 v1.0.6a 版本中简单修复了这个 css 文件额外带来的部分问题。但仍有一些问题未处理，强烈建议您登录百度账号以避免出现不必要的问题。 2. 同样的，在使用百度主题后也有可能会出现不必要的问题，建议您在使用本主题时不要使用百度自带的皮肤功能。 反馈： 在 stylish 反馈可能较晚才能收到回复，您如果在使用过程中遇到什么问题可以在 这篇文章 留言，不一定能解决就是了。 鸣谢： pan_cao - Baidu Lite 百度轻 silence lu - bilibili33 娘 背景图：P站id 62101308

data.name: Dark One Piece Ex (OPEX)
Flight Rising Festival Reminder
data.description: This adds a little reminder to the home page that contains the dates and times for upcoming or ongoing Flight Festivals and Microholidays. I have to manually update the text, so check back for updates often or make sure that Stylus has auto update on. Tested with chrome & firefox, your mileage with other browsers may vary. Animated screenshot. See additional info for changelog etc.

data.name: Discord Cyberpunk Neon Transparent
data.description: Cyberpunk Neon color scheme is a cyberpunk/outrun color scheme based on the Cyberpunk Neon Color Palette. Want more of it? Check out the Cyberpunk Neon GitHub If you want to change the background, edit the CSS file and change the URL image (instructions inside). If you like my work you can buy me a ko-fi or support me on liberapay.
